markdownRemark.html:
I split my first visit to Europe between wandering a metropolis of diverse architecture and what felt like venturing into a fairytale. I spent countless hours at parks in Paris, watching people come and go, seeing the sunlight slowly shift across the ground, and enjoying time passing. In Switzerland, I was in awe of the natural beauty of the valleys, mountains, and alpine lakes and the lives people have built in these picturesque locations.

This photo collection features scenes from Paris and Lauterbrunnen Valley, Bern, Gruyères, Lake Thun, Appenzell (Saxer Lücke), Lucerne, and Zurich in Switzerland.

childrenYaml.alt: Eiffel Tower from Arc de Triomphe
